authorCommits.message:
Fix `belongs_to` and ID field linking to child resources if configured (#3109)

* Fix such that belongs_to fields respect `link_to_child_resource` on resource or on field options

* Fix automatic linking of id fields to child resources if requested

* Small refactor to not shadow method

* Update app/components/avo/base_component.rb

---------

Co-authored-by: Paul Bob <69730720+Paul-Bob@users.noreply.github.com>

Add ability to specify `default_sort_direction` on a resource (#3116)

* Add ability to specify `default_sort_direction` on a resource

* Remove redundant default app/controllers/avo/base_controller.rb

Co-authored-by: Paul Bob <69730720+Paul-Bob@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update spec/features/avo/default_sort_column_and_direction_spec.rb

---------

Co-authored-by: Paul Bob <69730720+Paul-Bob@users.noreply.github.com>

[Fix] When initializing an Action any class variables should be set to nil if appropriate (#1720)

Co-authored-by: Paul Bob <paul.ionut.bob@gmail.com>
Fix: ActiveStorage current url_options should be set as a hash of url options (#1707)

Chore: support view component v3 by updating slot setter methods to new `with_*` API (#1698)

Co-authored-by: Adrian <adrian@adrianthedev.com>
